idea:

idea:
GreyAtom helps people upskill into emerging technologies like Big Data, Data Sciences, AI, Deep Learning using its platform GLabs.


This platform simulates the real world work environment, so the learners are not learning on the theoretical concepts but doing a practice which makes them industry ready. All the learners get mentorships from the world-class industry practitioners to help them at a crucial juncture in their journey. 


Current E-Learning like Udacity, Coursera, Udemy has less than 7% completion rate. We have a completion rate of 78% for our paid learners and 82% of them are able to get the jobs after doing our learning track.


We have recently deployed our programming learning path at Mumbai University, where more than 3000 students got the benefit. Our vision is to add more and more technology programs on the platform and become a go-to platform when its about learning tech. 


This approach is scalable across since learners learn online and get the mentorship via real live streaming with our mentors spread across the world. We have mentors from top-notch tech companies like Google, LinkedIn, Microsoft etc..


# of Learners to date

 - in 2017 -> 150 Paid Learners / 8K Free Learners

 - in 2018 -> 1250 Pais Learners / 25K Free Learners


We are here to solve the massive skill gap in engineering stream. Students stay in the college for 4 years and they are still not ready for the industry. It's a massive challenge and we believe GLabs is the answer.
name: GREYATOM EDUTECH PRIVATE LIMITED
